snippet: “The Events,” a drama by the Scottish playwright David Greig, will have its New York premiere at New York Theater Workshop next winter.
abstract: Scottish playwright David Greig's drama The Events will have New York premiere at New York Theater Workshop in February 2015.
lead_paragraph: “The Events,” a drama by the Scottish playwright David Greig, will have its New York premiere at New York Theater Workshop next winter.

headline.print_headline: A New York Premiere for a Scottish Play
headline.main: A New York Premiere for a Scottish Play
